text: The Black Phone 2 is an upcoming American supernatural horror movie. It is expected to released on October 17, 2025. It was directed by Scott Derrickson and produced by Jason Blum, Scott Derrickson, and C. Robert Cargill. It is the sequel to the 2021 movie The Black Phone. The movie is set in high school and Finney and Gwen have to try and stop The Grabber again. Principal photography for the movie started in Toronto on November 4, 2024 and ended on January 23, 2025. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s supernatural movies Category:2020s horror movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:American ghost movies Category:American horror movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Movies directed by Scott Derrickson Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Upcoming movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies
title: The Black Phone 2
